印度计划在减税后保留市场借贷目标
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，印度计划在本财年下半年保持借贷计划不变，并消化近期消费税削减带来的任何收入损失。【原文：India plans to keep its borrowing program unchanged for the second half of the financial year and absorb any revenue losses from recent consumption tax cuts, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: SMG控股公司在瑞士首次公开募股中寻求高达11亿美元的投资
item.description: SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG 的股东希望通过首次公开募股筹集多达 9.03 亿瑞士法郎（约合 11 亿美元）的资金，这将是今年迄今为止欧洲最大的首次公开募股之一。【原文：SMG Swiss Marketplace Group AG’s shareholders are looking to raise as much as 903 million Swiss francs ($1.1 billion) in an initial public offering, which would mark one of Europe’s largest so far this year.】

item.title: 马来西亚工业产值出人意料，为利率决定提供依据
item.description: 马来西亚的工业生产连续第二个月以快于预期的速度增长，凸显了经济复苏的迹象，促使央行上周维持利率不变。【原文：Malaysia’s industrial production grew at a faster-than-expected pace for a second straight month, underscoring signs of a resilient economy that prompted the central bank to keep interest rates unchanged last week.】

item.title: Quadrille Capital 为科技投资融资 5 亿欧元
item.description: 风险投资和成长型股权投资管理公司 Quadrille Capital 募集了 5 亿欧元（5.87 亿美元）资金，用于投资美国和欧洲科技领域的成长型公司。【原文：Quadrille Capital, an investment manager in venture capital and growth equity, has raised €500 million ($587 million) to invest in growth companies in the US and European technology sectors.】

item.title: 本田在日本推出售价 1.83 万美元的电动 Kei 汽车，与日产汽车一较高下
item.description: 本田汽车公司（Honda Motor Co.）为日本市场推出了其首款轻型电动乘用车，并打赌这款新车型可能有助于启动日本市场对更环保汽车的需求。【原文：Honda Motor Co. unveiled its first lightweight electric passenger car for the Japanese market, betting the new model may help kickstart demand for greener vehicles in the country.】

item.title: 需求出现疲软迹象，中国钢厂受到挤压
item.description: 铁矿石的涨势与中国钢铁需求的低迷形成了鲜明对比，即使在中国传统的建筑旺季到来之际，钢厂仍受到挤压。【原文：Iron ore’s rally is clashing with sluggish Chinese steel demand, leaving mills squeezed even as the nation’s construction season traditionally picks up at this time of year.】

item.title: Vantage 数据中心从阿布扎比 GIC 融资 16 亿美元
item.description: Vantage Data Centers 已获得 16 亿美元的投资，以帮助扩大其在亚太地区的业务，包括在马来西亚收购一个数据中心园区。【原文：Vantage Data Centers has secured a $1.6 billion investment to help expand its business in the Asia-Pacific region, including the acquisition of a data center campus in Malaysia.】

item.title: 中国因削减养猪场数量以应对供过于求而传唤养猪企业
item.description: 中国政府召集最大的养猪企业讨论减产措施，这是中国政府为解决供过于求和提振价格而采取的最新举措。【原文：China’s government has summoned its biggest pig breeders to discuss measures to cut production, in its latest move to tackle oversupply and bolster prices.】

item.title: 区块链支持的贷款机构 Figure 和支持者在首次公开募股中筹集到 7.875 亿美元资金
item.description: 基于区块链的信贷公司Figure Technology Solutions Inc.及其部分支持者在首次公开募股中筹集了7.875亿美元，股票定价高于市场定价范围。【原文：Blockchain-based credit company Figure Technology Solutions Inc. and some of its backers raised $787.5 million in an initial public offering, pricing shares above a marketed range.】

item.title: 激进投资者揭示日本公用事业股的廉价优势
item.description: 关西电力公司（Kansai Electric Power Co.【原文：Kansai Electric Power Co.’s deeply discounted valuation underscores its appeal to activists investors such as Elliott Investment Management which just revealed a stake in the Japanese utility company.】

item.title: 纽约市公交公司 2024 年因逃票损失 10 亿美元：报告
item.description: 据一家财政监督机构称，2024 年纽约市公交系统因逃票损失的收入约为 10 亿美元，这笔巨额收入可帮助弥补预算缺口或支付三轮票价上涨。【原文：New York City’s transit system in 2024 lost approximately $1 billion of revenue from fare evasion, a vast amount that could help fix budget shortfalls or cover three rounds of fare increases, according to a fiscal watchdog.】

item.title: 诺和诺德（Novo）和奥斯泰德（Orsted）让丹麦富裕起来。繁荣时代是否已经过去？
item.description: 在其巅峰时期，丹麦的企业冠军似乎无人能及。诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）长期以来主要以生产胰岛素而闻名，去年，随着对 Ozempic 和 Wegovy 的需求激增，该公司成为欧洲最有价值的公司。在此之前，世界上最大的海上风能开发商 Orsted A/S 也取得了成功，2021 年，随着各国政府向绿色能源投入资金，该公司的估值创下新高，并竞相向国际市场扩张。【原文：At their heights, Denmark’s corporate champions seemed untouchable. Novo Nordisk A/S, long known mostly as an insulin maker, was Europe’s most valuable company last year, after riding a surge of demand for Ozempic and Wegovy. That followed the success of Orsted A/S, the world’s largest offshore wind developer, which in 2021 was celebrating record valuations and racing to expand internationally as governments poured money into green energy.】

item.title: 服务业将英国经济从特朗普的关税冲击中解救出来
item.description: 在关税和税收面前，英国经济的表现比人们担心的要好，这得益于其强大的服务业，而这种韧性可能会加剧英国央行对通货膨胀的担忧。【原文：The UK economy is holding up better than feared in the face of tariffs and taxes thanks to its powerhouse services industry, resilience that may fuel Bank of England concerns about inflation.】

item.title: 欧洲央行将维持利率不变，因为经济经受住了关税的考验：决策指南
item.description: 欧洲中央银行将在第二次会议上按兵不动，相信经济能够承受唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税和法国再次出现的政治动荡。【原文：The European Central Bank is set to leave interest rates on hold for a second meeting, convinced the economy can endure President Donald Trump’s tariffs and renewed political turmoil in France.】

item.title: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服首款仿人机器人彰显其人工智能雄心
item.description: 马云支持的蚂蚁金服集团公司周四展示了其首款仿人机器人，正式加入了中国公司为在前沿技术商业化方面与美国竞争而不断加强的努力。【原文：Jack Ma-backed Ant Group Co. showcased its first humanoid robot on Thursday, formally joining an intensifying effort by Chinese companies to compete with the US in commercializing a frontier technology.】

item.title: 散户投资者热情不减，小盘股和 IPO 无惧盈利阴霾
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 李在镕警告美国移民袭击可能打击投资
item.description: 韩国总统李在明（Lee Jae Myung）说，美国移民突袭导致 300 多名韩国工人被拘留，这让向美国投入数十亿美元的公司感到不安。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung said a US immigration raid that led to the detention of more than 300 Korean workers has unsettled companies pouring billions into America.】

item.title: 印尼新任财政部长快速推进 120 亿美元计划
item.description: 印尼新任财政部长公布了一项约 120 亿美元的现金注资计划，以刺激贷款，这证明了他上任才两天就致力于总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）的增长议程。【原文：Indonesia’s new finance minister unveiled a roughly $12 billion cash injection to stimulate lending, proving his commitment to President Prabowo Subianto’s growth agenda barely two days into the job.】

item.title: 中国制药商股票因特朗普可能采取限制措施的报道而下跌
item.description: 有报道称，特朗普政府一直在讨论对来自亚洲国家的药品实施重大限制，此后中国的药品相关股票跌跌不休。【原文：Chinese drug-related stocks stumbled after a report that the Trump administration has been discussing major restrictions on medicines from the Asian nation.】

item.title: 激进分子变身高管，为日本基金寻找富有的投资者
item.description: 一位日本激进投资者接任了他的一家目标公司的总裁，现在他又成立了一家股票基金，寻找包括家族办公室在内的美国投资者作为客户。【原文：A Japanese activist investor who took over as president of one of his target companies has now started an equity fund, seeking US investors including family offices as clients.】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博称不必坚持资本利得税提案
item.description: 韩国总统李在明（Lee Jae Myung）表示，他认为没有必要坚持一项扩大股票投资者资本利得税征收范围的提案。【原文：South Korean President Lee Jae Myung said he doesn’t see the need to stick to a proposal that would have expanded the pool of stock investors subject to capital gains tax.】

item.title: 全球竞争对手苦苦挣扎，中国锌冶炼企业紧抓不放
item.description: 中国的锌生产商正在向海外矿商争取更好的供应条件，因为他们受益于世界其他地方冶炼厂的关闭。【原文：China’s zinc producers are pushing for better supply terms from overseas miners as they benefit from smelter closures elsewhere in the world.】

item.title: 交易员为通胀数据做准备，黄金稳定在历史记录附近
item.description: 在美国生产者价格意外下跌支持美联储放宽政策之后，黄金在略低于纪录的价位企稳。【原文：Gold steadied just below a record after a surprise drop in US producer prices supported the case for the Federal Reserve to ease policy.】

item.title: 联邦检察官调查三色公司欺诈指控
item.description: 据知情人士透露，联邦检察官正在调查二手车销售商和次级汽车贷款公司 Tricolor Holdings。【原文：Federal prosecutors are digging into used car seller and subprime auto lender Tricolor Holdings, which filed to liquidate in bankruptcy court on Wednesday, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 巴里克以 11 亿美元出售加拿大最后一座金矿
item.description: 巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.）同意以最高 11 亿美元的价格将其在加拿大的最后一座金矿出售给 Carcetti Capital Corp.【原文：Barrick Gold Corp. agreed to sell its last gold mine in Canada to Carcetti Capital Corp. for up to $1.1 billion, as one of the world’s biggest bullion producers seeks to capitalize on surging prices for precious metals.】

item.title: 印尼收益率曲线自 2023 年初以来最陡峭，原因是财政担忧
item.description: 由于对印尼财政前景的担忧持续存在，印尼短期和长期债券收益率之间的差距有望扩大。【原文：The gap between yields of Indonesia’s short- and long-dated bonds is poised to increase as concerns over the country’s fiscal outlook persist.】

item.title: 瑞银首席执行官称关税对通胀和美联储的影响尚不明确
item.description: 瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）首席执行官塞尔吉奥-埃尔莫蒂（Sergio Ermotti）表示，全球关税对美国经济和通胀的影响仍不明朗，这使得预测美联储政策前景变得更加困难。【原文：UBS Group AG Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti said the impact of global tariffs on the US economy and inflation remain unclear, making it harder to predict the outlook for Federal Reserve policy.】

item.title: 加纳领导人踏上胜利之旅庆祝早期经济收益
item.description: 加纳总统约翰-马哈马在当选后的首次新闻发布会上大放厥词，庆祝经济增长加快、通货膨胀放缓和货币走强。【原文：Ghanaian President John Mahama used his first press conference since his election to take a victory lap, celebrating faster growth, slower inflation and a stronger currency.】

item.title: 新西兰央行行长霍克斯比重申今年现金利率为 2.5%
item.description: 新西兰储备银行行长克里斯蒂安-霍克斯比（Christian Hawkesby）重申，该行的核心预测是，到今年年底，官方现金利率将再下降半个百分点，但降息的步伐将取决于新收到的数据。【原文：Reserve Bank of New Zealand Governor Christian Hawkesby reiterated that the bank’s central projection is for the Official Cash Rate to fall by another half-percentage point by year’s end, though the pace of reductions will depend on incoming data.】
